mapper.insert: insert into onlinelearning (Learning_id, student_id, course_id, video_url, quiz_Results) values (#{learning_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{student_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{course_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{video_url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quiz_Results,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: select Learning_id, student_id, course_id, video_url, quiz_Results from onlinelearning
